actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

official_title: To amend the Commercial Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1986 to permit an eligible individual to operate a public works vehicle without requiring the individual to pass a written or driving test for operation of a commercial motor vehicle.

summary.text: Amends the Commercial Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1986 to direct the Secretary of Transportation to issue regulations to make a State eligible for basic and supplemental grants (for the testing of persons who operate commercial motor vehicles) and highway funds regardless of whether or not the State allows such a person to operate a public works vehicle without first taking and passing a written and driving test.

titles.title: To amend the Commercial Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1986 to permit an eligible individual to operate a public works vehicle without requiring the individual to pass a written or driving test for operation of a commercial motor vehicle.
